title: UNHCR concern over testimonies of abuse and sexual violence against refugee and migrant women and ...
text: ( Source : UNHCR - Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ) Briefing Notes, 23 October 2015 This is a summary of what was said by UNHCR spokesperson Melissa Fleming -to whom quoted text may be attributed -at the press
